channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gerrymander for Me, but Not for Thee
item.description: Democrats have excelled at gerrymandering in states such as Illinois and California — they have no cause to complain when the GOP does it, too.

item.title: If An Immigrant Leaves The U.S. Indefinitely, How American Are They?
item.description: A Texas Democrat’s sudden departure overseas 'for the foreseeable future' raises important questions about immigration, assimilation, and American ide...

item.title: Rwanda accepts up to 250 deportees from the U.S. under Trump's third-country plan
item.description: Rwanda agreed to accept up to 250 deportees from the United States under the Trump administration's expanding third-country deportation program, its g...

item.title: Auto Industry Myths That Belong in the Junkyard
item.description: Rather than needing more government ‘help,’ U.S. automakers are threatened by government intervention.

item.title: Trump says he's considering four candidates to replace Powell as Federal Reserve chairman
item.description: President Trump said Tuesday that he plans to name a replacement for Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell and that four prospects are under consider...

item.title: Watch How Obama Used NPR To Launder Lies About Trump And Russia In 2016
item.description: After the interview, Obama left, then came back in and asked to go back on camera to say one more thing about the CIA.

item.title: Poll: Majority Of Voters Believe Obama’s Deep State ‘Committed Crimes’ In Russiagate
item.description: More than two-thirds of likely voters surveyed in the Rasmussen Report survey said there must be consequences for crimes committed in the scandal.

item.title: It Won’t End Well For Texas Dems Fleeing Their Duties. Just Ask Wisconsin Liberals
item.description: As Texas House Democrats hole up in Illinois and New York to stall a congressional maps vote, Wisconsin conservatives are feeling deja vu.

item.title: Texas Republicans Play Catch-Up in Gerrymandering
item.description: Hardball in Texas isn’t exactly unknown to Democrats.

item.title: Homeland Security Committee Member Says She’s Loyal To A Different Homeland
item.description: The founders knew our republic could not survive if its people -- let alone leaders -- were filled with foreign attachments.

item.title: Judicial Activism Won’t Restore Planned Parenthood’s Federal Funding
item.description: Trump kept his promise to defund Big Abortion. Rogue judges can’t stop what Congress has done.

item.title: An Idea Whose Time Has Come
item.description: Teachers’ unions and their allies should be afraid.
